technology.short_description: Tzeentch listens. Tzeentch sees. Tzeentch knows.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Reveal Faction Intentions"

technology.short_description: Only a fool believes they make their own choices. The Great Conspirator has known their mind since the moment of their creation.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Open Gates"

technology.short_description: Knowledge is both source and fuel for the Raven God's timeless, limitless power. Thus, there must always be more knowledge.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10% for armies
Construction time: -2 for Library buildings

technology.short_description: The sound is a chilling howl from the void, a siren song of madness that strips reason from even the strongest mind.

effects.description: Enables charmed attacks for Screamers of Tzeentch
Charge bonus: +10 for Screamers of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: Horrors are wildly unstable by nature, caught only in a brief dalliance with existence, but the correct incantations may bind them to greater corporeality.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +4 for Iridescent Horrors

Missile resistance: 10%
	(all characters factionwide)

technology.short_description: Howling mania. Writhing tendrils. An abundance of warped limbs. Gift upon gift upon unbearable gift, by the grace of the Changer.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +8% for Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
Charge bonus: +10 for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
Spell resistance: 20% for Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: Magic is matter, and matter is magic. Both, behind the vaunted but illusory rules of reality, are in a constant state of glorious flux.

effects.description: Construction cost: -15% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings

technology.short_description: The iridescent waters of the Well of Eternity reveal all to Tzeentch's patient gaze.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Give War Co-ordination Target"

technology.short_description: The witless mortals call it 'magic'. Here is the truth of the matter: this great energy is Change itself given eldritch form, and Tzeentch decrees to whom it is allocated.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +25% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
Ammunition: +25% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: The Winds of Magic shift through a fountain of indescribable colours as, somewhere far beyond, the Raven laughs.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +20

technology.short_description: To remain in stasis is a fate worse than even the cruellest death. Praise the Architect of Fate, for He brings blessed change â€“ and not a moment too soon.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -5%

Barrier hit points: +250
	(all characters factionwide)
Number of uses: +1 for bound spells on Lord of Change units

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units
Requires line of sight to the target

technology.short_description: The mind is the one true battlefield. Only by luring more mortals to His ineffable cause can Lord Tzeentch prevail in the Great Game.

effects.description:
Tzeentch corruption: +2
	(all Cultist Heroes)

Spread Corruption action: Tzeentch corruption is increased by an additional 2
	(all Cultist Heroes)
Growth: +5

technology.short_description: Let dull metal become lustrous gold. For the Changer of Ways, this requires only a thought.

effects.description: Lord and Hero recruit rank: +4 for Lore of Metal spellcasters
Income from all buildings: +5%
Armour: +10 when under siege

technology.short_description: All of this has happened before, and all of this shall happen again and again. Only Tzeentch decides the when.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Break Alliance"

technology.short_description: The honour of serving The Great Schemer's eternal, ineffable will is both wage and fuel for His shrieking legion of change.

effects.description: Upkeep: -3%
Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
Global recruitment duration: -1 turn(s) (minimum 1)
Global recruitment capacity: +1
Spell resistance: 40% for Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: Hail the writhing fire of change! All glory to the true nature of Chaos!

effects.description: Lord recruit rank: +4
Cooldown: -10% to "Unholy Pact with the Changer"

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to "Soul Leech of Tzeentch"
Cooldown: -10% to "Chosen of Tzeentch"

ui_effects.localised_text: Fires of Tzeentch grants regeneration and weakness to fire upon an enemy unit

contact_phase_effect.onscreen_name: Fires of Change - Restore 5 Hit Points per second

technology.short_description: Should one refuse to open their eyes to truth, it is only right that they should be parted from them.

effects.description: Income from raiding: +50%
Income from all buildings: +15%

technology.short_description: Such power there is in words. Power that belongs only to the Raven God.

effects.description: Army ability: "Bolt of Change"

technology.short_description: All knowledge belongs to the Bringer of Change, and he will reclaim it at will.

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to all spells
Bound spell: "Glean Magic" for Lord of Change units

technology.short_description: To look upon the standard of Tzeentch, crawling with eldritch, multi-hued symbols and tempestuous energies, is to look upon madness writ in living cloth.

effects.description: Cooldown: -20% to Lore of Tzeentch and Metal spells

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units
Requires line of sight to the target

technology.short_description: The puppeteering of space and time is accompanied by the acrid-sweet smell of burning reality, and the sense of something serpentine tunnelling through one's mind.

effects.description: Teleport stance usage cost: -100% Winds of Magic

technology.short_description: Once sufficient raw material is seized in the name of the Great Sorcerer, it is but child's play to transmute its essence into materials of great value.

effects.description: Construction cost: -10% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
Construction time: -1 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
Income from sacking and looting settlements: +25%

technology.short_description: Which caused which â€“ the writhing, sanity-stripping runes or the unnaturally shifting steel that bears them? Only Tzeentch knows.

effects.description: Barrier: +10% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
Armour: +10 for Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chosen of Tzeentch and Chaos Knights of Tzeentch units
Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: Blue and gold are His colours. Nine is His number. The Raven is His totem. Infinite is His knowledge.

effects.description: Army ability: "Storm of Fire"

technology.short_description: Deep within the Crystal Labyrinth, the Weaver of Fates pulls at the strings of time. Thus do his myriad servants grow in strength and wisdom at unnatural pace.

effects.description: Lord recruit rank: +3
Barrier: +10% for Lord of Change units
Barrier: +10% for Tzeentch Soul Grinder units
Armour: +10 for Lord of Change, Chaos Warshrine of Tzeentch and Soul Grinder of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: Ancient knowledge, arcane deceptions and the exquisite gift of insanity: to His most faithful, Tzeentch bestows Ruinous blessings.

effects.description: Hero action success chance: +20% for Cultists
Campaign line of sight: +25%

technology.short_description: None can resist the portal's whispered call â€“ but all consumed by it will proceed on their way to oblivion.

effects.description: Tzeentch corruption: +2
Bound spell: "Infernal Gateway" for Lord of Change units
Upkeep: -10% for Lords and Heroes

technology.short_description: The Raven's light dances across flesh â€“ and then through it, illuminating it with cascades of indescribable colour from within. In this way, existence is revealed as illusion.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +2 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +10

Tzeentch corruption: +2
	(all provinces)
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for spells

technology.short_description: Ask miracles of the Impossible Fortress and ye shall receive. For what is wealth to Tzeentch but a whisper upon the breeze?

effects.description: Income from Settlement buildings: +25%

technology.short_description: The Changer of Ways sees the secret hatred within, the simmering greed behind the mask of friendship. That is how He makes puppets of us all.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Force Rebellion"

technology.short_description: Most believe that mutation is random, but the faithful know that Tzeentch's instructions for how the flesh will one day warp are inscribed upon the very fibres of one's being.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
Recruitment cost: -9% for all units
Recruitment cost: -25% for Spawn of Tzeentch units
Armour: +10 for Marauders of Tzeentch and Marauder Horsemen of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: Vision is illusion. In this, we are all of us but the puppets of Tzeeneth, and he severs and re-ties our strings at will.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Reveal Shroud"

technology.short_description: The flesh writhes and warps, taking on ever-changing, disorientating new forms most minds cannot focus on, seeming even to spasm in and out of existence.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: Time is but a mirage, a self-deception employed by mortals to impose order upon madness. Should the Changer will it this futile illusion may be dispelled.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Track Army"

technology.short_description: Whispering doubt. Hissing mistrust. Murmured envy. The Great Conspirator's dark will makes a mockery of allegiance, courage and friendship alike.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with all factions
Bound spell: "Treason of Tzeentch" for Lord of Change units

technology.short_description: Deception is its own reward. Come what may, the Weaver of Fates rejoices when a long-planned scheme is at last revealed.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +4 for Cultists
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

technology.short_description: A kaleidoscope of blazing colour, hypnotic in its majesty. Before those engulfed by it are reduced to ashes, they will witness the truth.

effects.description: Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition

Tzeentch corruption: +2
	(all characters factionwide)
Bound spell: "Tzeentch's Firestorm" for Lord of Change units

technology.short_description: Searing scarlet, blinding blue, glorious gold: these are the writhing colours of Tzeentch's uncanny balefire.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
Missile strength: +10% for Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: The squealing giggle of a single Horror can shred mortal minds to ribbons. This is why great Tzeentch provides an ever-swelling legion of these Whirling Destroyers.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -10% for Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
Passive ability: "Arcane Mirth" for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch and Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: The Fool God Nurgle, and his flat circles of unchanging time. Let there be disruption! Let there be Change!

effects.description: Chance of a plague spreading: -25%
Leadership: +10 when fighting against Nurglish factions

technology.short_description: Only by Tzeentch's will do any of us draw breath. Due gratitude must be shown.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance: +10%
Reinforcement range: +25%
Control: +2

technology.short_description: The unseen Mark of Tzeentch is inscribed upon every stone in every land, for this is His design. To those granted the Raven's sight, the bounties are great indeed.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
Ambush defence chance: +10%
Local recruitment capacity: +1

technology.short_description: Bony knuckles inside the brain, kneading, coaxing, enraging â€“ stoking eternal hatred.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Force War"

technology.short_description: From the shadows, He watches. He sees the darkness behind the lies. He pulls at unseen strings, and summons forth tumult and turmoil.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Halt Faction"

technology.short_description: From the forbidden tomes of Tzeentch, a fresh incantation to pluck a Shrieking Skyray from the heavens and bind it to His servitor's will.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -15% for Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
Recruit rank: +2 for Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
Armour: +10 for Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chosen of Tzeentch and Chaos Knights of Tzeentch units
